document_data.name: Sibylline Sisterhood
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sibylline Sisterhood''' was a group of female oracles devoted to [[Savras]], the All-Seeing One.
document_data.Activities: The Sisterhood wandered [[west Faerûn]] sharing prophecies and visions with those willing to pay a modest fee. While accurate, the visions were often clouded so that the recipient usually only appreciated their value in hindsight. Most of the members of the Sibylline Sisterhood were novice [[sibylite]]s.
